content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for taking the time to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I must clarify that I am looking for the highest possible rental price. May I ask what you are willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm afraid that is not within my range. I am looking for a rental price that would maximize my gains as a landlord. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No room for negotiation. I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month.
TERMINATE
name: Bo Li from China

content: I understand. Thank you for your time and consideration. If you have any other questions or need any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
